localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: QLO is a browser-based interactive 3D tool to generate custom clothing mockups. Our 3D digital avatars can fit into your brand, just upload your design, adjust settings and download your images directly in your Browser.
blogPost.body: QLO is a browser-based interactive 3D tool to generate custom clothing mockups. Our 3D digital avatars can fit into your brand, just upload your design, adjust settings and download your images directly in your Browser.
blogPost.title: QLO - Generate custom 3D digital clothing mockups in your browser.
blogPost.author: Augis Kaleinykas

localize.description: QLO是一个基于浏览器的交互式3D工具，可以生成定制的服装模型。我们的3D数字头像适合您的品牌，只需直接在浏览器中上传您的设计、调整设置和下载您的图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中生成自定义3D数字服装模型。

localize.description: QLO是一個基於瀏覽器的交互式3D工具，可以生成定製的服裝模型。我們的3D數字頭像適合您的品牌，只需直接在瀏覽器中上傳您的設計、調整設置和下載您的圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中生成自定義3D數字服裝模型。

previous.excerpt: An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.
previous.title: Radix UI - Open-source UI components for building accessible web apps.

localize.description: 一个开源UI组件库，用于构建高质量、易访问的设计系统和Web应用程序。
localize.tagline: 用于构建具有辅助功能的Web应用程序的开源UI组件。

localize.description: 一個開源UI組件庫，用於構建高質量、易訪問的設計系統和Web應用程序。
localize.tagline: 用於構建具有輔助功能的Web應用程序的開源UI組件。

next.excerpt: ProStyles is an AI camera app that edits your photos & videos in the style of pro photographers as you shoot them. The built-in Style Store features AI style models created by some of the best photographers out there.
next.title: ProStyle Camera by NeuralCam - AI Cam App - Photos auto-edited in the style of pros

localize.description: ProStyles是一款人工智能相机应用程序，在你拍摄照片和视频时，它会以专业摄影师的风格编辑它们。内置风格商店的特色是由一些最好的摄影师创建的人工智能风格模型。
localize.tagline: AI Cam App-照片以专业风格自动编辑

localize.description: ProStyles是一款人工智能相機應用程序，在你拍攝照片和視頻時，它會以專業攝影師的風格編輯它們。內置風格商店的特色是由一些最好的攝影師創建的人工智能風格模型。
localize.tagline: AI Cam App-照片以專業風格自動編輯
